text: Lucile Watson (May 27, 1879 â€“ June 24, 1962) was a Canadian actress. She played the Lady Margaret Cronin in Waterloo Bridge (1940). She also played Fanny Farrelly in the movie Watch on the Rhine The actress was born in Quebec City. She died after a heart attack in New York City. title: Lucile Watson
